long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google chrome extension to see total claimable rewards for Thor nodes. Not affiliated to Thor-Financial. Provided as is with no warranty.  üòä  

Guide to use:

This will only work on Thor's app screen. The web page must be loaded and your rewards must be visible. 

When using for the first time, refresh the page once.

open the extension and click the calculate button. 

This was created over weekend, hope you like it, will try to extend this for ‚ö° POWER nodes as well.
